column2: ggplotly(ggplot(data_analysis[,list("avgNO2"=mean(no2)),by=c("year","seasons")],aes(x=as.factor(seasons),y=avgNO2,fill=as.factor(year),group=1)) +geom_line(linetype = "dashed",color="black")+geom_point()+facet_wrap(~as.factor(year))+labs(title = "Average No2 level in HYD by years",x="seasons", y = "Average No2 value",fill="years")+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5,face = "bold",color = "black"))+coord_flip())
